title: Chapter 1694 - Single-Handedly Facing A Group Of Kings
body:
Chapter 1694 - Single-Handedly Facing A Group Of Kings

When Su Yi appeared, the tense, hostile atmosphere sank into silence. All eyes were instantly upon him.

He’s finally here!

The Immortal Lords who’d suffered crushing defeats at Su Yi’s hands looked at him strangely. Some delighted in his misfortune, while others pitied him.

Some, like Gong Nanfeng, Weng Changning, and the other unrivaled Immortal Lords, just watched coldly from the sidelines.

Meanwhile, several of the Immortal Kings made no attempt to conceal their enmity and murderous intent!

Tang Lingqi frantically transmitted an explanation of the situation and the Tang family’s stance to Su Yi. “Fellow Daoist, no matter what happens next, you have to endure! So long as you cooperate, the Tang Family will do everything in its power to ensure that you escape this predicament safely!”

But Su Yi just let out a dry laugh and transmitted, “A few Immortal Kings, nothing more. They aren’t worthy of forcing me to endure!”

Tang Lingqi was stunned. He’d anticipated that someone as cold and aloof as Su Yi would struggle to accept their arrangements and resist backing down. Still,...
original_title: Chapter 1694 - Single-Handedly Facing a Group of Kings
